General.Name: M.K. Real Estate Development Public Company Limited
General.Description: M.K. Real Estate Development Public Company Limited engages in the property development business in Thailand. The company operates through five segments: Real Estate; Rental Warehouse, Factory and Others; Golf Services; Property Management; and Health and Wellness Center. It develops and sells land, houses, and condominiums; and provides property management services. The company is also involved in building and parking rental activities; and golf course business. In addition, it operates health and wellness centers. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
